DOC.brief_summary: This project aim identify novel pharmacological target treatment memory disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Losartan Diphenhydramine Emotional Cognitive Functions Healthy Human Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: To investigate effect histamine H1 receptor antagonist diphenhydramine angiotensin II receptor antagonist losartan emotional cognitive function healthy human subject .
